text: Tropic of Cancer is a 1970 American drama movie directed by Joseph Strick and was based on the 1934 autobiographical novel Tropic of Cancer by Henry Miller. It stars Rip Torn, James T. Callahan, David Baur, Laurence Lign√®res, Phil Brown, Dominique Delpierre and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. == Other websites == * Category:1970 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Joseph Strick Category:Paramount Pictures movies
title: Tropic of Cancer (movie)
